title: Guessing The Number
whatsnew:
• 🚀 Initial release of Guessing The Number game on Android

  • 🎮 Interactive number-guessing feature (1–100 range)

  • 🌟 Child-friendly interface and intuitive design

  • 📊 Smart feedback system to guide guesses

  • 💡 Great for early learners, kids, and casual players

  • 🔧 General stability improvements and performance enhancements
longDescription:
• Guessing The Number by dhimanp is a fun and educational number game designed for children aged 6 to 9 and above. It’s the perfect combination of entertainment and early number sense development.

  • Players are challenged to guess a random number between 1 and 100. With each attempt, they receive feedback guiding them closer to the correct answer, enhancing logical thinking, pattern recognition, and numerical estimation.

  • This light and engaging app encourages kids to play, think, and improve their problem-solving skills in a fun way — and it’s suitable for adults too who want a quick brain teaser!

  • 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Key Features:

  • 🔢 Simple number-guessing mechanics

  • 🎯 Educational and brain-boosting gameplay for kids

  • 🧠 Encourages number comparison and logical deduction

  • 🌈 Colorful, child-friendly design

  • 💯 Completely free to play (contains banner ads)
